page.title: 15Local Childrens' Games
page.content: "What Time Is It Mister Wolf" is a popular local game. It is played with as many people as you like. The person who is on stands with their back to the rest of the people. The one who is on is the wolf. The children shout "What time is it Mister Wolf? and he replies any time of the day or dinnertime. If he shouts dinnertime he runs after them. If he catches someone that person is the on. "Red Rover" is played with 2 teams standing opposite one another holding hands in a long line. One team calls to the other "Red Rover, Red Rover we want" and then the name of a person in the opposite team. That person runs and tries to break through the arms of the other team. If you break through you stay on that side. At the end of the game the team with most people wins.
